column2: NEVADA DMV TEST
Question Text
1. When you prepare to make a left turn from a one-way road into a two-way road, you must:
column4: approach the turn in the left lane or from the left side of a single lane.
column6: approach the turn in the right lane or from the right side of a single lane.
column8: enter the two-way road to the left of its center line.

column2: 2. When you get in a car to drive, the first thing you should do is:
3. A yellow arrow means:
column4: The same as a steady yellow light.
column6: Do not go in the direction of the arrow.
column8: If you intend to turn in the direction of the arrow, be prepared to stop.

column2: 4. While driving, it is important to slow down:
5. Roads are most slippery:
column4: when it first starts to rain.

column2: 6. Left turns on a red light are allowed:
column4: at intersections, after stopping, if the way is clear.
column6: from a one-way street into a one-way street.

column2: 7. You may not pass another vehicle on either side of a _______ centerline.
8. A driver cuts off another vehicle, or threatens another motorist or a pedestrian. These are examples of:
9. As you drive on the expressway, make sure:
column4: your directional signal goes off before you change lanes.
column6: you cut off vehicles behind you when you change lanes.

column2: 10. What does this road sign indicate?
column10: Area reserved for people with disabilities

column2: 11. What is the slow moving vehicle symbol?
12. ________ is the only effective way to reduce your Blood Alcohol Content (BAC).
13. At a stop sign there is no stop line or crosswalk. You must stop:
column6: only if the traffic signal turns red.
column8: after you enter the intersection, if you have a clear view of traffic on the intersecting roadway.

column2: 14. In heavy rain, tires can begin to ride on the water that is on top of the road pavement. This is called:
15. This road sign means:
column4: Traffic flows only in the direction of the arrow

column2: 16. Before a school bus stops to load passengers, the driver will usually flash:
17. This road sign means:
column6: You may proceed at regular speed through the intersection
column8: Slow down and be prepared to stop if necessary
column10: You must come to a complete stop

column2: 18. Before entering a traffic circle, drivers must slow down and yield to ___________ in the traffic circle.
19. At a school crossing, drivers should:
column4: always stop, whether there’s a stop sign or not.
column6: always sound their horn and stay alert.
column8: None of the other answers is correct.
column10: watch for children and be ready to stop.

column2: 20. Drivers should be aware that a motorcyclist may:
column4: move to the center of the lane on steel deck bridges.
column6: quickly change speed or lane position.
column8: decrease speed and rise off the seat when approaching a railroad crossing.

column2: 21. The ‘Slower Traffic Keep Right’ sign is used:
22. When a ‘Road Closed’ sign is displayed, drivers must:
column6: look for a detour or another route.
column8: come to a complete stop and wait for the lights to turn green.
column10: remove the sign and move forward.

column2: 23. What does a flashing left yellow arrow mean?
column6: Vehicles turning left must stop if they can. The light will soon be red.
column8: Left turns are allowed. Yield to oncoming traffic and pedestrians.

column2: 24. Hydroplaning is a situation in which:
column4: your tires throw water to the rear, causing problems for the vehicles behind.
column6: one of your tires goes flat, causing the others to skid.
column8: the tires of the car ahead cause sheets of water to splash on your vehicle.
column10: your tires ride up on a thin surface of water, losing contact with the pavement, and resulting in sudden loss of control

column2: 25. Tailgating:
column6: can frustrate other drivers and make them angry.
column8: cannot result in a traffic citation.

column2: 26. This warning sign:
column4: tells drivers that the minimum safe speed is 45 MPH.
column6: provides advance notice to upcoming speed limit change.
column8: shows the current speed limit that all vehicles traveling in the direction of the arrow must not exceed.
column10: indicates the suggested highest safe speed.

column2: 27. Parking is not allowed:
column4: in an intersection, unless permitted by signs.
column6: within 300 feet of a pedestrian safety area.
column10: within 250 feet of a traffic light.

column2: 28. A red traffic sign means?
29. What is the meaning of orange traffic signs?
column8: Warning of school, pedestrian, and bicycling activity.
column10: Stop, do not enter or wrong way.

column2: 30. Worn tires:
column8: may cause you to hydroplane even with very little water on the road.

column2: 31. This road sign means:
column6: You may proceed only if the way is clear
column8: You are about to enter a one-way street the wrong way

column2: 32. If another car is in danger of hitting you, you should:
33. This road sign means:
column4: Always come to a complete stop
column6: You must come to a complete stop and yield right-of-way
column10: Slow down and yield to traffic on main road when merging

column2: 34. This road sign means:
column6: You must come to a complete stop
column10: Drive with caution and be ready to stop

column2: 35. Bicyclists must:
column4: remain near the left edge of the road.
column6: ride in a bicycle lane, if available.
column8: remain to the right when they prepare for a left turn.
column10: travel with more than two side-by-side in a single lane, if possible.

column2: 36. In the following situations, drivers should increase their following interval:
column4: When following vehicles that are required to come to a stop at railroad crossings.
column8: When it is hard to see ahead because of bad weather.

column2: 37. Drivers may need more space in front of their vehicle:
column6: when it is hard to see ahead.
column8: when carrying a heavy load or pulling a trailer.

column2: 38. The minimum drinking age in this State is ____ years.
39. This sign means:
column4: Drivers will soon be on a roadway with two-way traffic.

column2: 40. This road sign means:
column4: The center lane is shared for left turns in both directions of travel.
column6: Sharp left turns ahead, in both directions.
column8: Vehicles may only travel in the center lane.
column10: The center lane in both directions of travel will soon turn left.

column2: 41. When changing lanes, you can check your blind spot by:
column4: checking the rearview and outside mirrors.
column6: turning your head and glancing over your shoulder.

column2: 42. This sign means:
43. If a driver follows you too closely, you should:
column4: move to another lane if possible.
column10: increase your speed as you are probably driving too slowly.

column2: 44. When driving, it is important to keep a space cushion _______ of your vehicle.
column6: only on the left and right side

column2: 45. Anything that requires you to _______ could cause you to crash.
column4: take your attention away from driving
column6: take your eyes off the road
column8: take your hands off the wheel

column2: 46. When they approach this sign, drivers must:
column8: slow down and watch for children crossing the road.

column2: 47. Examples of proper glass maintenance include:
column4: Keeping your windows clean and clear.
column8: Making sure there is enough windshield fluid in the reservoir.

column2: 48. Double solid yellow lines mean:
column4: the lane to the left may pass.
column6: passing is permitted in either direction.
column8: the lane to the right may pass.
column10: passing is not permitted in either direction.

column2: 49. If a vehicle starts to skid on water the driver should quickly apply the brakes.
50. This sign means:
column4: Parking is not allowed at 8:30 AM and at 5:30 PM
column6: You can only park between 8:30 AM and 5:30 PM.
column8: No parking between 8:30 AM and 5:30 PM.
